A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Just to be clear and to reiterate the majority of reviews on here.... This is an appalling Star Wars film. So many plot holes....so many possibilities wasted...the legend of Luke destroyed for all eternity. 

I will never pay to see another Star Wars film again. I will endeavor to remember the original films and the excellent books that took the adventures of Luke\, Leia et al to new levels.

To conclude...the Star Wars film franchise died with this film...
